TopicTitle: It's nice to be here, from the crew of Starship Fantasy

Articles.Content:
Greetings, I'm a big fan of Kerbal space, and spend all my gaming time there since I got it. I've received lots of blank stares on Facebook, and Google Plus, and a lot of vague ideas from screenshots found in Google searches.

I've avoided forums at large since my high-school days (2002'ish) because of the squabbling and hierarchy that seems to evolve there.

After a few days of posting here, I can tell this is what I was looking for. This is where everyone's ideas are being posted, I should have checked this out ages ago.

The Fantabulous Monkeysee

http://www.fragmentedpoe.com

http://www.fragmentedpoe.com/KSP/
I'm new too. Good to know from a fellow newcomer that it's a good forum!

It is a good forum. The biggest pitfalls, I'll warn you now:

1. Do Not Ask "When will X happen in the game?", for ANY value of X.

2. MechJeb starts flamewars, with pro- and anti- factions. Personally, I try and stay out of those. But it's the one ingame subject that really seems to push some people's buttons HARD. Just so you know.

Have fun, and point the right end towards space!
